author: Bob
title: People’s last wishes that show the human spirit at its finest (30 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
I’ve said it a million times before and even in my darkest moments I’ve always believed that life is a precious thing. The world is full of wonderful human beings doing beautiful acts for each other, and in a world so full of negative news and rampant cynicism it’s important to be reminded of the gift of life we all share. Below are examples of people whose dying wishes will melt your heart… 
6-Year-old Elena was diagnosed with brain cancer, so she decided to start leaving little love notes all around the house for her parents to find after she passed. 2 
“Tattoo artist grants 12-year-old boy’s last wish with colorful markers.” 3 
“Once more to the beach.” 4 
“North Carolina neighborhood celebrates Christmas in October so a dying woman can have her last Christmas.” 5 
“He wanted to see the dolphins playing for the last time.” Advertisement Advertisement 6 
“Thousands of carolers surround home of a dying 8-year-old girl to fulfill her wish for a massive Christmas sing-along.” 7 
“One terminally ill woman’s last wish was a visit to the hospital to see the scans of her unborn grandchild.” 8 
“A scottish teen fulfilled his dying wish of taking his girlfriend to the prom.” 9 
“Dying world war two engineer gets last wish granted: to be reunited with iconic plane, after bosses see him staring forlornly through fence from his wheelchair.” 10 
“Mom’s last dance with my dad the night before she passed away after a 15 year battle with cancer.” Advertisement Advertisement 11 
“Father dying of terminal cancer has wish to see his daughter graduate from his alma matter granted after Texas A&M brings the ceremony to him.” 12 
“Dying dad walks his 11-year-old daughter down the ‘aisle’ to give her a lasting memory.” 13 
“A week before my grandfather passed away, I snuck his favorite beer into the nursing home for him. It was his last beer ever.” 14 
“This girl gets her dying wish of being serenaded by Florence and the Machine.” 15 
“Cancer patient Mario, 54, says goodbye to the giraffes at Rotterdam Zoo, whose enclosure he used to clean.” Advertisement Advertisement 16 
“Five-year-old girl suffering from cystic fibrosis is granted her dying wish to ‘marry’ her best friend in heartbreaking wedding ceremony just hours before she passes.” 17 
“Terminally ill Star Wars fan gets his dying wish as he’s granted access to early ‘Force Awakens’ screening.” 18 
“Dying 7-year-old-boy tells his seriously ill mother to let him die so he can give her his kidney and save her.” 19 
“92-year-old grandmother gets dying wish to fly in a rainbow motorized parachute fulfilled.” 20 
“Terminally ill air force Veteran granted last wish of sky diving.” Advertisement Advertisement 21 
“Terminally ill patient had “The best day of his life” when his wish for the last ride was fulfilled.” 22 
“Cancer-stricken son holds dying dad’s hand one last time.” 23 
“Wyatt Gillette, the 8-year-old son of a Marine drill instructor, was named an honorary Marine one day before dying.” 24 
“Her dying wish was to see her best friend, Oliver the cat, one last time to say goodbye.” 25 
“Kailem married his girlfriend, Brandi-Lee Wadwell, in a small ceremony by his hospital bed.” Advertisement Advertisement 26 
“Homeless man learned he was dying of cancer with only a few weeks to live and his only wish was for someone to adopt his sweet dog, Baby.” 27 
“Final catch. Dying Vietnam Veteran fulfills his last wish by being wheeled to a pond in his hospital bed to go fishing.” 28 
“Tijn has one last wish: to prevent children dying from pneumonia. So he challenged people to paint their nails and donate money. He has raised over 2.6 million euros to this day.” 29 
“Dying father gets his final wish: to see his son graduate.” 30 
“Touching moment: crew stand and salute dying Pearl Harbor Sailor as he is granted final wish to board the Dewey again.”
